casebody.data:
No. 163,

Misc.

Goldsby v. Harpole, Superintendent, Mississippi State Penitentiary. William R. Ming, Jr. and George N. Leighton for petitioner. Joe T, Patterson, Attorney General of Mississippi, J. R. Griffin and John H. Price, Jr., Assistant Attorneys General, and Ross R. Barnett for respondent.

C. A. 5th Cir. Cer-tiorari denied.
